DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , single-center , randomize , double-blind , double-dummy , crossover trial Depakote ER vs. Seroquel agitate behavior among veteran dementia . After consent obtain washout period one week five half-lives taper ( necessary ) , 20 eligible patient randomize received one two treatment . The first DEPAKOTE ER , initiate 250 mg daily . The treatment Seroquel , start 25 mg BID . Both treatment co-administered placebo match drug ( preserve blinding ) . Using serial examination blind laboratory reporting , dos adjust clinical response achieve serum valproate level least 50 mcg/mL . After treatment period six week , patient cross treatment without washout ( dos adjust concurrently ) second six-week treatment period . The Cohen-Mansfield Agitation Inventory ( CMAI ) primary outcome measure . Secondary measure include Behavior Pathology Alzheimer 's Disease Rating Scale ( BEHAVE-AD ) ; Clinical Global Impression Scale - Severity ; Clinical Global Impression Scale - Improvement ; Barnes Akathisia Scale ( BAS ) ; Abnormal Involuntary Movements Scale ( AIMS ) . Outcome measure performed end six-week treatment period avoid carryover effect .
